The API consists of this classes and methods:

Class LPV
- the main class encapsulating LPV. 

methods and constructors:
LPV() - parameter free constructor
void connectSQLSpaces(String server,int port) - connects to the SQLSpaces server at the given port
void disconnectSQLSpaces() - disconnects from the server
ArrayList<String> getUserNames() - returns list of users with logs on the server
void setActiveUser(int id) - Selects which user is to be shown on the visualisation panel. The users are indexed as in the result of getUserNames()
LPVPanel getCanvas() -  Returns the an ancestor of JPanel on which the visualisation takes place.
int getActiveHeight() - Returns the preferred height of the LPVPanel
int getActiveWidth() - Returns the preferred width of the LPVPanel
void addEventListener(LPVEventListener listener)
void removeEventListener(LPVEventListener listener)

Interface LPVEventListener

methods
handleLPVEvent(LPVEvent e) - handles event e

Class LPVEvent
- fires when a new action tuple with a new user is stored in the tuple space of the server

methods
boolean isNewUser() - true if a new (previously not stored) user has stored an action tuple into the tuple space
String getNewUserName() - returns the name of the user
int getNewUserIndex() - returns the index of the new user in the next call of getUserNames()
